name: EMC
overview: EMC is a manufacturer of software and systems for information management and storage. EMC produces a range of enterprise storage products, including hardware disk arrays and storage management software. Its flagship product, the Symmetrix, is the foundation of storage networks in many large data centers.

milestones.description: For its second purchase in less than a week, EMC Corp. said it plans to buy network attached storage (NAS) company Isilon Systems Inc. of Seattle for approximately $2.25 billion.
milestones.source_description: EMC ponies up $2.25B for NAS firm Isilon

milestones.description: it expects its acquisition of Isilon Systems Inc. to take place on Tuesday
milestones.source_description: EMC to complete Isilon buyout Tuesday

milestones.description: A buyout of EMC Corp. (NYSE: EMC) by another firm could be possible if that was the desire of shareholders, CEO Joe Tucci said during an investment conference in New York Wednesday.
milestones.source_description: Tucci: EMC open to acquisition, if a buyer can afford it
